description:
***** Join 6,800 students from 131 countries in a quick, fun, easy way to learn Java desktop/GUI and Android Mobile App programming! *****

Learn Java the quick, easy way by building three complete apps from start to finish, for PC, Mac, or Linux - PLUS, build the same apps for phones and tablets using Java in Android Studio! Code step-by-step with Computer Science Professor and Author, Dr. Bryson Payne.

High-definition videos and crystal-clear audio, with colorful screencasts

  • You'll start programming in Java in minutes!
  • Build a Hi-Lo Guessing Game, a Secret Message Encoder App, and an animated, multi-touch BubbleDraw App to share with your friends!
  • Code each app for the command line (text-based) first, then as a windowed desktop application (complete with a graphical user interface/GUI).
  • Reuse your Java code to build a native Android mobile app for all three programs!
  • Learn Java basics like loops, variables, conditions and classes as you play, all the way through animation, threads, graphics, and advanced GUI mobile apps.

 
All the latest tools for 2016! Java 8, Eclipse IDE, Android Studio 1.5 and Android SDK version 6.0 - course published in 2016 with all the latest Java development tools for desktop and mobile! 

** New BONUS Q&A video added this month! See Lecture 43, Free Preview enabled! **

For beginners or IT professionals who want to advance!

I designed this programming course to be easily understood by beginners, with example code I use in my college-level courses. My signature "code and reuse" style will have even experienced programmers building playable desktop and mobile apps in just a few lessons.

Everything you need to get started right away

Complete with working code downloads and high-definition videos, you'll be able to work alongside a professor with 18 years' teaching experience and over 30 years of programming knowledge. You'll also receive a Certificate of Completion upon finishing the course.

No Risk: Preview three complete apps from Sections 2, 6, and 10 now for FREE, and enjoy a 30-day money-back guarantee after you enroll! And, we've made this course easy to afford so you can get started now!

Praise for Learn Java Like a Kid:

★★★★★ "The easiest, clearest path to building your first Java and Android Apps!" - Jim G., USA

★★★★★ "A Perfect Course" - This course was so easy to understand as compared to others that I took. The instructor is very interesting, he provides you the motivation to keep on learning and in fact his teaching exhibits that he has real knowledge of the course. I will advise everyone who wants to learn Java to start up by this course. - Issah Mudasir, Egypt

★★★★★ "Fun way to Learn Java!" - Bryson Payne does a great job teaching Java. Throughout the course you will build some fun apps. Each app starts off for the console version, moving into the Java Swing to build a GUI app for desktop, then finishes with building the app in Android Studio.The instructions are easy to understand, and the instructor makes it a fun experience. A great course for Beginners of any age :). Awesome course! - James Conley, Udemy student
title: Learn Java Like a Kid: Build Three Desktop and Mobile Apps!
